thread.title: The Best Canadian Sports Moment of Summer is...
thread.title_full: The Best Canadian Sports Moment of Summer is...

author: Gabriella Cook,Tanya Casole-Gouveia
title: The Best Canadian Sports Moment of Summer is...
text:
Ellie Black gave the Best Canadian Sports Moment of Summer She made it through three rounds and four weeks of voting by you By Gabriella Cook, Tanya Casole-Gouveia, CBC Sports Posted: Oct 07, 2015 10:27 PM ET Last Updated: Oct 07, 2015 10:27 PM ET The results are in! After 1 month of voting you have chosen artistic gymnast Ellie Black and her five Pan Am games medals as the Best Canadian Sports Moment of Summer! 
Ellie Black was the most decorated Canadian at the Pan Am Games and has been chosen by you as the Best Canadian Sports Moment of Summer. 
Canadian Ellie Black wins gold on the balance beam in artistic gymnastics #CBCPanAm http://t.co/YfGaDdmUgl ‚Äî @cbcsports 
The 19-year-old dominated Toronto 2015 by pulling in five medals in artistic gymnastics: gold for her balance beam routine, gold in the floor exercise, gold in women's all around, silver in the team event and bronze in vault. 
Congratulations Ellie Black for making it through three rounds and four weeks of voting against some pretty impressive competition. 
Here's a little refresher of the moments that got knocked out in the earlier rounds of our Best Sports Moment of the Summer polls: 
Men's 4x100m Relay 
#canada wins bronze in the 4x100 relay in #beijing because #usa DQ'd ! justification for our DQ in the pan am games ! üá®üá¶üèÜüçÅ
